§ 71104. Planetary radar The Administrator shall maintain a planetary radar that is comparable to the capability provided through the Deep Space Network Goldstone facility of the Administration. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3439.)
